mapper.select: SELECT a.ifmmSeq ,a.ifmmName ,a.ifmmId ,a.ifmmGenderCd ,a.ifmmDob ,b.ifmeEmailFull FROM infrMember a LEFT JOIN infrMemberEmail b ON b.ifmeDelNy = 0 AND b.ifmeDefaultNy = 1 AND b.ifmmSeq = a.ifmmSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE infrMember SET ifmmDelNy = 1 WHERE ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT a.ifmmSeq ,a.ifmmId FROM infrMember a WHERE 1=1 AND a.ifmmId = #{ifmmId}
SELECT a.ifmmSeq ,a.ifmmName ,a.ifmmId FROM infrMember a WHERE 1=1 AND a.ifmmId = #{ifmmId} AND a.ifmmPassword = #{ifmmPassword}
